documents.title: memorial for king richard iii
text: the final journey of king richard iii has been commemorated in market bosworth with the unveiling of this stone memorial

loughborough artist damien witty created the piece
he said he used green slate because of the monarch 's time at sheriff in penrith .
he said it also represented the green grass of the battlefield .

documents.title: your questions : where was the wigston magna workhouse ?
text: one of our curious readers has been in touch using your questions to ask : `` where was the wigston magna workhouse ? ''
a great question because it 's been tricky to find the answer .
in a book called workhouses of the midlands by peter higginbotham it confirms there was a workhouse in wigston and in 1777 there were 32 inmates .
the workhouse was open until 1837 when a bigger workhouse was built in enderby ( image below ) to house all the inmates within the blaby poor law union , including wigston magna .
but where was the wigston magna workhouse ?
well , i 've been in touch with the greater wigston historical society and chairman mike forryan said : `` we know little about the workhouse other than names of people who resided there . ''
mr forryan said there was a lane on bulls head street called `` workhouse lane '' .
- the lane went down the side of the bulls head inn which was opposite mowsley end .
it 's thought this could have been where the workhouse was however there could have been other buildings rented for the purpose .
this area of wigston was demolished by the council to build the by-pass - the society does n't have any photographs of the building .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your comments : empty homes in leicester
text: on our facebook page you 've been talking about empty homes in leicester .
jason owen said : `` this is criminal , especially with houses being in such demand and so many new houses being built . ''
barrie hawkins said : `` we complain there is a house shortage yet there is hundreds of houses lying to rot .
it makes it harder for young couples to get a house due to high rent and high property rate .
yet these houses could be done up and lived in but instead we build these new estates .
we do n't need new houses old ones are easy to do up . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: bbl trophy final : plymouth raiders 58-91 leicester riders
text: leicester riders retained the bbl trophy with a 91-58 victory over the plymouth raiders in a one-sided final .
leicester went 20 points ahead in the first quarter and plymouth never came within 12 points after that as they trailed 47-26 at half-time
leicester coach rob paternostro : `` i could see it in the guys ' eyes - they were eager to play after two weeks off .
`` you saw that in the way we came out .
we set the tone early with some great play on both ends of the floor .
this is a group of guys that do n't complain about [ how many ] minutes or shots they 're getting , they just want to win . ''
author: BBC Sport

his thoughts were echoed by policeman rob nixon who said : `` very sad news .

documents.title: watch : empty homes in leicester
text: every area has its empty houses but here in leicester there are more than 4,000 with around a quarter of them being unused for at least 18 months .
sarah thrower is a mother of two and is renting a `` tiny little house '' in the city - she said they are `` climbing over each other '' .
she 's hoping to get on the council homing register so she can get a bigger house .
she finds it especially frustrating when there are so many empty homes in the city .
in leicester they have an empty homes team who are bringing about 200 empty homes back into use every year .
carole thompson leads the team at leicester city council

documents.title: anglo-welsh cup final : exeter chiefs 12-16 leicester tigers
text: leicester tigers claimed their first silverware in four years as they edged out exeter chiefs in a tight anglo-welsh cup final at the stoop .
in a season which has seen leicester part company with director of rugby richard cockerill , a first trophy since their premiership title of 2013 will boost confidence for the rest of the campaign .

leicester assistant coach geordan murphy : `` the guys have been passionate and committed throughout this tournament and some of the defensive shots that went in during the final quarter were fantastic .
`` there was real ferocity in the tackle and it was some heroic defence at the end . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: men due in court charged with shepshed murder
text: to start with this morning - police have charged two people with the murder of a 45-year-old man in shepshed .
timothy smith was found fatally injured inside a car on the gelders hall industrial estate on thursday evening .
mark law , aged 20 , from sandringham rise in shepshed , and a 17-year-old male also from the town are due before leicester magistrates this morning .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: two fatal house fires in leicestershire
text: two people died in separate house fires in leicestershire last night .
the first was in melton mowbray - a 72 year old woman died and two others suffered smoke inhalation after the a property on lambert close caught fire around 20:00 .
less than half an hour later emergency services were called to a house on warwick road in wigston where there was another blaze in a house .
a 51-year-old man was taken to hospital with severe burns and later died .
neither fires are thought to be sus
